welcome.name: Welcome to Central Long Island Sound, New York
welcome.text:
You will need to do the following in order to set up the General NOAA 
                		Operational Modeling Environment for Central Long Island Sound :
                		1. Set the model run parameters.
                		2. Input the wind conditions.

wind_type.title: Wind Type
wind_type.text:
Wind can significantly influence oil movement and can force oil
                		to move in a different direction from the currents.

                		You can choose wind that is constant in direction and
                		speed for the entire model run, or you can choose wind
                		that varies in direction and/or speed over time.

text.title: Almost Done
text.text:
You are ready to move to the Map Window to start your spill and run the
                		model. Here are the tools you'll use : 
                		
                		To set the location of your spill(s), you will use the Spill Tool.
                		
                		To run the model, you will use GNOME's run controls:
                		Run, Pause, and Step.
